items.title: Home
items.text:
Send Subscribe to our newsletter

For full documentation visit zensical.org.

Design references UI designFonts
  • Inkscape - Open source vector graphics editor.
  • Beautifycode - Online code formatting & minifying tool with SVG support.
  • Font Awesome - Web icon library & toolkits.
  • CSS Gradients - An open source CSS gradients editor, library & tool collection.
  • Lucid icons - Web icon library.
  • Haikei - Free svg generation tools
  • Google fonts - Open source fonts from Google.
  • FontVS - Online preview tool for local & online fonts with custom options/variants.

items.title: Commands
items.text:
• zensical new - Create a new project
  • zensical serve - Start local web server
  • zensical build - Build your site

items.title: Admonitions
items.text:
Go to documentation

Note

This is a note admonition. Use it to provide helpful information.

Warning

This is a warning admonition. Be careful!

items.title: Details
items.text:
Go to documentation

Click to expand for more info

This content is hidden until you click to expand it. Great for FAQs or long explanations.

items.title: Code Blocks
items.text:
Go to documentation

Code blocks
def greet(name):
    print(f"Hello, {name}!") # (1)!

greet("Python")

  1. Go to documentation

    Code annotations allow to attach notes to lines of code.

Code can also be highlighted inline: print("Hello, Python!").

items.title: Content tabs
items.text:
Go to documentation

PythonRust 
print("Hello from Python!")

println!("Hello from Rust!");

items.title: Diagrams
items.text:
Go to documentation

graph LR
  A[Start] --> B{Error?};
  B -->|Yes| C[Hmm...];
  C --> D[Debug];
  D --> B;
  B ---->|No| E[Yay!];

items.text:

Here's a sentence with a footnote.1

Hover it, to see a tooltip.

  • This was marked (highlight)
  • This was inserted (underline)

items.title: Maths
items.text:
Go to documentation

\[ \cos x=\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}\frac{(-1)^k}{(2k)!}x^{2k} \]

Needs configuration

Note that MathJax is included via a script tag on this page and is not configured in the generated default configuration to avoid including it in a pages that do not need it. See the documentation for details on how to configure it on all your pages if they are more Maths-heavy than these simple starter pages.

items.text:

## H2 Header

#### H4 Header

items.title: Text formatting
items.text: HTML rendering Markdown syntax bold text **bold text** italic text *italic text* bold and italic ***bold and italic*** strikethrough ~~strikethrough~~ inline code `inline code`

items.title: Unordered list
items.text:
- Item 1
- Item 2
  - Nested item
  • Item 1
  • Item 2
    • Nested item
  • Item 3

items.title: Ordered list
items.text:
1. First item
2. Second item
    1. Nested item
3. Third item
  1. First item
  2. Second item
    1. Nested item
  3. Third item

items.title: Unordered tickmark list
items.text:
- [x] Item 1
- [x] Item 2
    - [x] Nested item
- [ ] Item 3
  • Item 1
  • Item 2
    • Nested item
  • Item 3

}

}

items.text:

items.title: Horizontal rule
items.text: --- or *** or ___

items.title: Escaping characters
items.text: Use backslash to escape: \* \_ \# \`

items.title: Line breaks
items.text:
End a line with two spaces  
to create a line break.

Or use a blank line for a new paragraph.

First paragraph.

Second paragraph after blank line. Line breaks after two spaces.
